channel.title: About on DillonBaird.io
channel.description: Recent content in About on DillonBaird.io

item.title: Brands
item.description: Throughout my professional journey, an inherent entrepreneurial spirit has been the driving force behind my ventures. Inspired by the thrill of building something from scratch, I’ve ventured into a multitude of business realms, learning and adapting along the way. From tech startups to clothing lines, each business has been a testament to my passion for creation and innovation. Over the years, I’ve had the privilege of founding and managing a variety of small businesses.

item.title: Gear
item.description: Current Equipment The equipment I use today is leaps and bound from where I began; After many years attempting success on a very tight budget I’d gotten used to achieving what I needed to using the bare minimum hardware, but in recent years I’ve chosen to “splurge” and treat myself to some newer gear, though still never ’this years model’. I’m usually fairly flexible on where I’m working or what I’m working on, and can sometimes frequently change systems used through the week, but for the most part still always gravitate to the following gear:

item.title: Now
item.description: Work Availability In the fast-paced and ever-evolving world of today, most of my time is absorbed by my full-time role and the ongoing maintenance of my various brands and side projects. The demand for my skills and expertise often outpaces the time I have available. As a result, it’s with regret that I currently find myself unable to take on any unsolicited projects. However, I understand the challenges of finding the right fit for your needs, and so I’m more than willing to provide referrals to professionals within my network who may be better able to assist you.
